amendment.description: An amendment to provide that proposed legislation that imposes conditional requirements for receipt of federal assistance, or establishes duties arising from participation in voluntary programs, shall be considered as imposing a federal intergovernmental mandate and, therefore, subject to a point of order under the provisions of the bill. (Text of the amendment was printed as amendment No. 25, in the Congressional Record of January 18, 1995.).

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Volkmer amendment was withdrawn.
